coe528.lab1

Class Flight

  • java.lang.Object
    • coe528.lab1.Flight

  • public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
    This object represents a flight.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Flight

        public Flight(int flightNumber,
              java.lang.String origin,
              java.lang.String destination,
              java.lang.String departureTime,
              int capacity,
              double originalPrice)
        Creates a flight.
        Parameters:
        flightNumber - The flight's number.
        origin - Where the flight is coming from.
        destination - Where the flight is going.
        departureTime - When the flight is leaving.
        capacity - How many seats there are on a plane.
        originalPrice - The original cost of a seat (without discounts).

      • bookASeat

        public boolean bookASeat()
        If there are still seats left, the numberOfSeatsLeft is decreased by one and the boolean value of true is returned. Otherwise, false is returned.
        Returns:
